product_name: Salomon S-Lab Advanced Skin Hydro 5 Hydration Pack
long_description: The formfitting Salomon S-Lab Advanced Skin Hydro 5 Hydration Pack uses front hydration for convenience, and holds essentials for shorter endurance races. Enjoy all-day comfort with soft, stretchy fabric and load lifters at the shoulders; open 3D mesh and elastic jersey fabric at the lumbar area helps keep you cool and dry. The front has 2 energy pockets, 2 secure mesh pockets and 2 hydro pockets with two 16 oz. soft flasks with bite-activated valves; flasks are BPA-, phthalate- and PVC-free. The back has 2 zippered lateral pockets and 1 center-low compartment with 2-sided access. The Salomon S-Lab Advanced Skin Hydro 5 Hydration Pack features a pole holder, safety blanket, whistle and reflective accents.
short_description: The formfitting Salomon S-Lab Advanced Skin Hydro 5 Hydration Pack uses front hydration for convenience, and holds essentials for shorter endurance races.
